lead_paragraph: SHAPIRO--Lorraine. 1927-2016. A master teacher who inspired generations of children to live their dreams. Beloved wife of 65 years to Herb in a marriage for the ages. Adored mother of Michael, James, and Jill. Cherished grandmother of Eliza, Jay and Luke. Loving mother-in-law to Susan and Mary. She taught first grade until she was 78 and continued to volunteer in retirement, teaching children in oncology wards. An artist of quiltmaking and baking. Her imprint is indelible, a tribute to optimism, irrepressibility and zest. 1/3
